title: [整地|创世]zKingdoms——给玩家他们自己的世界！[1.8-1.14]
author: 黑白雨泽
txt_content:
本帖最后由 黑白雨泽 于 2020-7-16 19:34 编辑 




授权搬运

评论区坛友已测试Cat端理论支持1.7以上所有


请在下载前阅读以下内容
此插件不再定期维护兼容性：
·zKingdoms已在绝大部分Spigot服务端上经过测试
·不计划支持1.7及更低

Minecraft 1.14.x：
警告：插件在1.14.x运行不稳定
zKingdoms支持1.14.x世界和插件的使用。但请务必使用正确的jar文件。每个文件的标题都包含插件的更新编号和预期版本。
例如：zKingdoms-mc1.8-v.1.6.5 =服务器jar 1.8-1.13.2
例如：zKingdoms-mc1.14-v1.6.5 =服务器jar 1.14-1.14.3

优化：
强烈建议您下载并安装适用于您的服务器版本的fawe
以优化世界加载时间和世界编辑交互时间而不会出现大面积崩溃


特性:
zKingdoms目前具有以下特性：
 
这不是完整列表，只是主要功能。
- 自定义消息 

- 自定义GUI系统 

- 动物/怪物的生成限制 

- 天气/时间的限制 

- 世界种类 

- 世界共享 

- 高兼容性大厅 

- 聊天系统 

- 独立的权限

关于Minecraft 1.14.x：
[size=14.6667px]警告：插件在1.14.x运行[size=14.6667px]不稳定。
[size=14.6667px]?zKingdoms支持1.14.x世界和插件的使用。但请务必使用正确的jar文件。每个文件的标题都包含插件的更新编号和预期版本。
[size=14.6667px]例如：zKingdoms-mc1.8-v.1.6.5 =服务器jar 1.8-1.13.2
[size=14.6667px]例如：zKingdoms-mc1.14-v1.6.5 =服务器jar 1.14-1.14.3

指令：
/world - 允许GUI以及 创造 删除 探索 处罚(？) 和管理世界。
缩写:/w
/aworld- 允许强制重置世界，查看统计数据和其他管理操作。
缩写:/aw


权限：
·zkingdoms.player  - 允许创建和管理个人世界。
·zkingdoms.admin  - 允许访问所有命令/功能
完整权限:
 

-  zkingdoms.admin（允许访问所有命令/功能）
  -  zkingdoms.player（允许访问所有默认玩家命令）
  -  zkingdoms.command.stats（允许使用/aw stats/statistics） 

 -  zkingdoms.command.reset（允许使用/aw reset ） 

 -  zkingdoms.command.summon（允许使用/aw summon）
  -  zkingdoms.command.kick（从你的世界踢出玩家） 

 -  zkingdoms.command.delete（允许删除捷径） 

-  zkingdoms.command.menu（允许打开捷径菜单） 

 -  zkingdoms.command.explore（允许探索捷径） 

 -  zkingdoms.command.togglemode（允许切换私人模式） 

 -  zkingdoms.command.setdescription（允许玩家设置他们的描述）
关于捷径的翻译暂不确定 望大佬指正




配置文件：
 插件配置：

#-----------------------------------------
#
# [zKingdoms] v1.5 - Spigot 1.8-1.13.2
# By Zaviar, Do not redistribute.
# Contact: Spigotmc.org @ Zaviar_
#
#-----------------------------------------

#-------------------------
# Chat Management options
#-------------------------

#Good for single creative servers to customize chat
Chat System:
Enabled: true
Format: "&7%player%&8: &f%message%"
Join: "&a%player% joined the server."
Use Motd: true
Motd:
- " "
- "&eWelcome &6&l%player% &eto &6&lServer&e!"
- "&7Use /world to create a world"
- " "
Quit: "&c%player% left the server."

#Note: Chat system must be enabled for this to work
Chat Filter:
Enabled: true
List:
- "**"

#-------------------------
# World Management options
#-------------------------

#Set the maximum length a world's description can be
Max Description Length: 80
#Set the default description
No Description: "&7No Description "

#Set the gamemode of the owner when they join their world
Owner Gamemode: CREATIVE
Guest Gamemode: ADVENTURE

#Select what type of worlds are enabled to generate. This is obsolete
#if there is no item in the GUI linked with the generation type.
#DO NOT CHANGE CAPITALISATION
NORMAL Generation: true
FLAT Generation: true
VOID Generation: true

#Feed and regenerate health when a player joins a world
Heal Player: true

#Disable a player from staying in a vechile when joining a world
Eject Player: true

#Want weather/time cycles to change in kingdoms?
Weather Cycle: true
Light Cycle:
Enabled: true
Time: 6000

#Teleport the player to a safe spot (air) or to the exact location set
#This is highly suggested to be true.
Use Highest Block: true

#Select how high up the start block in void worlds will be placed
Y-Axis Start Block: 50

#Generate structures for flat/normal worlds?
Generate Structures: true

#Limits spawn of mobs, good for optimizing server load
Animal Spawn Limit: 25
Monster Spawn Limit: 25

#Do you want to restrict how far players can travel? do it here.
#This is suggested to be on to save server resources.
World Border:
Enabled: true
#Size is how far across it is, example: 5 would be 5x5 playable space
Size: 250

#Should worlds automatically delete? Select how a world can go without
#having someone in it before deletion
Timer:
Enabled: true
#Time in seconds (delay between last join and action)
Delete Delay: 900

GUI配置：

# Change what your gui's look like for creating, managing and visiting other worlds.

CreateGUI:
Size: 27
Title: "&8Select a kingdom type"
Items:
0:
Name: "&eNormal World"
Material: GRASS
Lore:
- " "
- "&fClick to create an random land"
- "&fto build your kingdom on!"
- " "
- "&7Biome: Random/all"
- " "
Amount: 1
Slot: 11
Type: NORMAL
1:
Name: "&eFlat World"
Material: DIRT
Lore:
- " "
- "&fClick to create an flat land"
- "&fwith nothing but grass!"
- " "
- "&7Biome: Plains"
- " "
Amount: 1
Slot: 13
Type: FLAT
2:
Name: "&eVoid World"
Material: BEDROCK
Lore:
- " "
- "&fClick to create an empty land"
- "&fwith just one piece of stone!"
- " "
- "&7Biome: Plains"
- " "
Amount: 1
Slot: 15
Type: VOID

MainGUI:
Size: 27
Title: "&8Kingdoms Dashboard"
Items:
0:
Name: "&dExplore Kingdoms"
Material: SIGN
Lore:
- " "
- "&7Click here to view other public"
- "&7kingdoms that you can join."
- " "
- "&fActive Kingdoms: &a%kingdoms_active%" 
- " "
Amount: 1
Slot: 11
Action: "Explore"
1:
Name: "&eTeleport"
Material: ENDER_PEARL
Lore:
- " "
- "&7Click to teleport"
- "&7to your kingdom."
- " "
Amount: 1
Slot: 13
Action: "Teleport"
2:
Name: "&cReset Kingdom"
Material: LAVA_BUCKET
Lore:
- " "
- "&7Click to reset your"
- "&7kingdom to nothing"
- " "
Amount: 1
Slot: 15
Action: "Delete"

ExploreGUI:
Size: 54
Title: "&8Explore Kingdoms"
KingdomList:
StartSlot: 9
EndSlot: 36
Item:
Name: "&2%player%'s Kingdom"
#Set to SKULL or PLAYERSKULL to set it to the players skull.
Material: SKULL
Amount: 1
Lore:
- " "
- "&fPlayers: &a%player_count%"
- "&fType: &a%type%"
- " "
- "&fDesc:"
- "%description%"
- " "
- "&7Click to travel!"

消息：

#Here you can select how messages look,
#All placeholders are pre-written in messages below.

No Permission: "&cNo permission."
Invalid Sub-command: "&cInvalid sub-command."
Invalid Player: "&cInvalid Player."

World:
Creating: "&aHold tight! We are creating a world for you..."
Created: "&aYou world has been created! use /world to get to it."
Deleting: "&cYour world is now being deleted..."
Deleted: "&cYour world has been successfully deleted."
Kick: "&cYou have kicked %player% from the world."
Kicked: "&cYou have been kicked from the world."
Kick World: "&cYou are not in the same world."
No World: "&cThis player doesn't have a world or it is asleep."
Data Error: "No world could be found or created for you."
Disabled Type: "&cThat world type is disabled or invalid."
Generating: "&aYour kingdom is asleep! Just a moment whilst we regenerate it."
Joining: "&eSending you to %world%'s world..."
Joined: "&f&l > &e%player% has joined the world!"
Privacy Change: "&eYour world privacy was changed to %privacy%."
Automatically Deleted: "&cYour world has been asleep for too long, its now being auto deleted."

Command:
Max Description: "&cThe description of your world must be less than %size%."
Description Set: "&eYour world's description was set to: &f%description%."
Usage:
- " "
- "&6World Usage:"
- "&e/w go: &fCreate/teleport to your world."
- "&e/w delete: &fRemove your world."
- "&e/w explore: &fExplore public worlds."
- "&e/w kick: &fRemove a player from your world."
- "&e/w togglemode: &fChange your privacy settings."
- "&e/w setdescription: &fset your world description."
- " "

Admin:
Force Summoned: "&cYou have been summoned to %player%."
Force Summon: "&c%player% has been summoned to you."
Force Reset: "&cYou reset %player%'s world."
Force Reset Target: "&cYour world has been reset by %player%."
Usage:
- " "
- "&6World Admin Usage"
- "&e/aw reset <player>: &fDelete a players world."
- "&e/aw summon <player>: &fSummon a player to you."
- "&e/aw statistics: &fCheck system statistics."
- "&e/aw reload: &fUpdate server configurations."
- " "

Statistics:
No Worlds: "&cThere are currently no worlds active."
Display:
- " "
- "&6&lzKingdoms Server Statistics"
- "&eActive: &f%active_worlds%"
- "&ePlayers: &f%active_players%"
- " "



GUI菜单中支持的所有变量:

操作：
?“delete” - 打开确认删除菜单。
[别名：“reset”]
?“teleport” - 将玩家传送到他们的世界。
[别名：“Tp”]
?“Explore” - 打开探索菜单

不建议没有在世界保护类插件下使用：
?“Gamemode_survival” - 将玩家的游戏模式设置为生存
?“Gamemode_creative” - 将玩家的游戏模式设置为创造

类型：
将被Config文件内的配置覆盖。
?“Normal” - 正常随机生成的minecraft世界。
[别名：“default”，“random”]
?“flat” - 平坦的Minecraft世界
?“void” - 只有你和一块石头
[别名：“empty”，“clear”]





截图:







支持：
有关功能请求，报告问题和支持，请与作者联系
Spigot私信：点击这里
或
Discord：ID 

Zaviar#7297

Config汉化：#-----------------------------------------
#
#汉化by黑白雨泽 错误联系1831159119 望各路专业人士指正
# [zKingdoms] v1.5 - Spigot 1.8-1.13.2 王国世界插件
# By Zaviar, Do not redistribute.
# Contact: Spigotmc.org @ Zaviar_  原作者联系方式
#
#-----------------------------------------

#-------------------------
# Chat Management options 聊天管理选项
#-------------------------

#Good for single creative servers to customize chat 有利于帮助管理员定制聊天
Chat System:
Enabled: true //是否开启定制聊天
Format: "&7%player%&8: &f%message%" //定制聊天格式
Join: "&a%player% 加入了服务器." //玩家进入时显示的消息
Use Motd: true //是否开启
Motd: //进服消息
- " "
- "&e欢迎&6&l%player% &e加入服务器&e!"
- "&7输入/world 创造一个世界"
- " "
Quit: "&c%player% 退出了服务器."

#Note: Chat system must be enabled for this to work 注意：要使用屏蔽词 必须启用定制聊天系统
Chat Filter: //屏蔽词
Enabled: true //是否开启
List: //屏蔽词列表
- "**"

#-------------------------
# World Management options 世界管理选项
#-------------------------

#Set the maximum length a world's description can be //设置世界可以渲染的极限尺寸
Max Description Length: 80 //最大渲染尺寸
#Set the default description //设置默认渲染尺寸
No Description: "&7世界未渲染:(" //未渲染部分的消息

#Set the gamemode of the owner when they join their world //设置主人加入自己的世界的游戏模式
Owner Gamemode: CREATIVE //主人的游戏模式
Guest Gamemode: ADVENTURE //游客的游戏模式

#Select what type of worlds are enabled to generate. This is obsolete 选定哪些世界类型可以生成 这是被淘汰的
#if there is no item in the GUI linked with the generation type. 如果在gui界面没有物品连接的可生成的世界类型
#DO NOT CHANGE CAPITALISATION ！！！不要更改下列设置！！！
NORMAL Generation: true //正常类型
FLAT Generation: true //超平坦类型
VOID Generation: true //空岛类型

#Feed and regenerate health when a player joins a world 是否在玩家加入王国世界是恢复满饱食度和生命值
Heal Player: true //设置是否恢复

#Disable a player from staying in a vechile when joining a world 禁止玩家在载具上时加入世界
Eject Player: true //设置是否驱逐玩家

#Want weather/time cycles to change in kingdoms? 是否要让王国世界内的天气/时间循环变换
Weather Cycle: true //天气循环
Light Cycle: //时间循环
Enabled: true //是否开启
Time: 6000 //时间

#Teleport the player to a safe spot (air) or to the exact location set 是否将玩家传送至一个安全的地方或是精准的位置
#This is highly suggested to be true. 强烈建议开启
Use Highest Block: true

#Select how high up the start block in void worlds will be placed 选择空岛世界的起始方块在多高的位置
Y-Axis Start Block: 50 //起始方块的Y轴坐标

#Generate structures for flat/normal worlds? 是否在超平坦世界和普通世界生成建筑（如地牢村庄）
Generate Structures: true //是否生成建筑

#Limits spawn of mobs, good for optimizing server load 怪物生成上限 有利于服务器的优化
Animal Spawn Limit: 25 //动物的生成上限
Monster Spawn Limit: 25 //怪物的生成上限

#Do you want to restrict how far players can travel? do it here. 是否限制玩家能跑多远
#This is suggested to be on to save server resources. 建议开启以优化服务器性能
World Border: //世界边界
Enabled: true //是否开启
#Size is how far across it is, example: 5 would be 5x5 playable space “边界大小”填写的是一个正方形的边长 例如 填5 世界总大小就是5x5的一个正方形
Size: 250 //边界大小

#Should worlds automatically delete? Select how a world can go without 世界是否会自动删除？设置一个世界怎么样会被删除
#having someone in it before deletion 在删除前需有人在其之中
Timer: //时间
Enabled: true //是否开启自动删除世界
#Time in seconds (delay between last join and action) “删除延迟”处的值以秒为单位（在最后一次登录后的延迟）
Delete Delay: 900 //删除延迟
GUI汉化:咕咕咕消息汉化:咕咕咕


服务条款
      不允许以任何形式重新分发该插件  
不允许对插件进行反编译、修改或反向工程。  您承认该插件处于早期开发阶段  作者Zaviar_有权随时更改这些条款

replies.author: Animalworld
replies.txt_content:
希望可以帮我和作者反馈一下
有很严重的bug
我可以破坏别人的世界 虽然可以更改模式 但冒险模式还是可以偷箱子的 
然后 如果我在别人的王国里面 而那个人删除了他的王国 那么下次进去的时候 他删除的王国变成了我的 正确的来说是 我和他的
而且我原有的王国消失了
这是特别严重的问题

replies.txt_content:

我可以破坏别人的世界 虽然可以更改模式 但冒险模式还是可以偷 ...
作者回复已修复

replies.author: Animalworld
replies.txt_content:
黑白雨泽 发表于 2019-7-8 18:32
作者回复已修复
无法删除我的世界
删除我的王国世界后
重新开创 地图会回来
也就是无论原版或者平旦 虚空
我最终都会回到原来的王国

且最好推荐作者配合mv 重置世界的时候删除世界

replies.author: Huyidao
replies.txt_content: bug太多了，那个自动清除世界我换了，false但还是会删除，气死我了，
